## Checklist

- [ ] Follows design token rules â€” no hardcoded colors (`text-white`, `bg-black`, etc.)
- [ ] Uses correct font families â€” `font-display` for headings/buttons, `font-body` for text, `font-mono` for data/code
- [ ] Tested in all three themes (Dark, Light, Warm)
- [ ] Verified WCAG AA contrast ratios
- [ ] Components use semantic Tailwind classes (`bg-surface`, `text-muted-foreground`, etc.)
- [ ] Props use explicit TypeScript interfaces
- [ ] Updated relevant documentation (`DESIGN_SYSTEM.md`, `CHANGELOG.md`, `docs/`)
- [ ] `design-tokens.json` updated if CSS variables changed
